events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as it does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello, I am here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received. Letâ€™s get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Thank you for responding. I have attached the photo of the wrong item and my order number is ORD123456789.
We have verified your details and will proceed with a full refund. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick assistance and clear instructions. Looking forward to the refund being processed.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our resolution.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request. Your input is highly appreciated.
